text: faerid emman tawalaa ean dhkrna, wahu alqran, walam yurid 'iilaa alhayat aldnya. dhlk aladhi hum ealayh hu mntha eilmuhum wghaythm. 'iina rabak hu 'aelam biman had ean tariq alhda, wahu 'aelam biman ahtda wasalak tariq al'islam. wafi hdha 'indhar shadid llesat almerdyn ean aleamal bikitab allh, wsnt rasulih salaa allah ealayh wslm, almwthryn lhwa alnafs whzwz aldunya ealaa alakhrt
